name: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) - Cerafy™ Biomimetic Ceramides
description: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) offers the Cerafy™ range of biomimetic ceramides including Cerafy™ Pure NPo, the first pure biomimetic ceramide III (NP) in the range. These biomimetic ceramides are designed to boost skin barrier function through precise structural mimicry of natural skin ceramides.
notes: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) is a major global chemical company. Cerafy™ branded ingredient line emphasizes biomimetic design for optimal skin compatibility. Pure NPo is first in range with more products in pipeline. Premium positioning for high-end formulations.
